songs.title: Stand Down
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Daddy said “You get one chance in life''
Daddy said “You get one chance in life''

[Verse 1: Jesy & Perrie]
Let me start it by telling you something
I think there's one thing you should know
We aren't playing no games, this isn't no playground
It's time to drop your sticks and stones
Cause I've been chasing dreams since I took my first sleep
And I'm gon' be lil' Bo so contemplate if you're the sheep
And we gon' bake a humble pie so egos cut a slice
And take a piece, hey

[Pre-Chorus: Jade]
So, you see
There's no point in underestimating me
Lock up all your thoughts and throw away the key
No, I don't want to hear it cause your sssh won't stick
No, it doesn't bother me

[Chorus: All (Perrie)]
Now I'm done with all your negativity
And I'm gonna let it wash all over me
I'll be stronger than your words, baby, I'm harder
My smile lights up the world, I'm flying higher
So stand down, don't want to hear it
Back it up now, don't want to hear it
Stand down, don't want to hear it
Back it up, back it up-up now
Stand down, don't want to hear it
Back it up now, don't want to hear it
Stand down, don't want to hear it
Back it up, back it up-up now

[Interlude]
Daddy said “You get one chance in life''
Daddy said “You get one chance in life''

[Verse 2: Leigh-Anne]
Come a little bit closer
Let me tell you about a girl you used to know
She ain't waiting for luck, no wishful thinker
She's going to do it on her own

[Pre-Chorus: Jade (Perrie)]
So, you see
There's no point in underestimating me
Lock up all your thoughts and throw away the key
No, I don't want to hear it cause your sssh won't stick (no, it doesn't bother me)

[Chorus: All (Perrie)]
Now I'm done with all your negativity
And I'm gonna let it wash all over me
I'll be stronger than your words, baby, I'm harder
My smile lights up the world, I'm flying higher
So stand down, don't want to hear it
Back it up now, don't want to hear it
Stand down, don't want to hear it
Back it up, back it up-up now
Stand down, don't want to hear it
Back it up now, don't want to hear it
Stand down, don't want to hear it
Back it up, back it up-up now

[Pre-bridge: Jesy]
L-l-ladies, let’s break it down

[Breakdown: All (Jade)]
Scuba-da, boba-da, boba-da ba
Scuba-da, baduba-ba, baduba-ba ba
Scuba-da, beeb do da bo dap
Scuba-da, baduba-ba, baduba-ba, baduba-ba, baduba-ba, baduba-ba-ba-bo bada, and now click

[Bridge: All]
I'm just gonna do me, I'mma do this right
You got nothing on me, you're just wasting your time
Take a listen to me cause I'm a tell you tonight
Oh, woah, woah

[Chorus: All (Perrie)]
Now I'm done with all your negativity
And I'm gonna let it wash all over me
I'll be stronger than your words, baby, I'm harder
My smile lights up the world, I'm flying higher
So stand down, don't want to hear it
Back it up now, don't want to hear it
Stand down, don't want to hear it
Back it up, back it up-up now
Stand down, don't want to hear it
Back it up now, don't want to hear it
Stand down, don't want to hear it
Back it up, back it up-up now
